structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Clerks, Attorneys And Other Officers Of Judicial Courts

law.text: If at a sitting of any court neither the clerk nor assistant clerk is present, the court may appoint a temporary clerk, who shall perform the duties of the office during the sitting or until the clerk or assistant clerk resumes his duties, unless an appointment under one of the two preceding sections is sooner made or unless a new clerk has qualified.
